installCommand: cd /vercel/path0 && npm install --include=dev && cd /vercel/path0/shared && npm install --include=dev && cd /vercel/path0/frontend && npm install --include=dev
buildCommand: cd /vercel/path0/shared && npm run build && cd /vercel/path0/frontend && npm run build && cp -r /vercel/path0/frontend/dist /vercel/path0/dist
